leo.ukb 0.5.1

Check DNAnexus Job Status & Dashboard

dx_status.Rd

Checks the status of a specific job or displays a dashboard of recent jobs.

Usage

dx_status(all_projects = TRUE, job_id = NULL, limit = 5)

Arguments

all_projects

Logical. If TRUE, shows jobs from all projects in the account (account-wide). Default is FALSE (only current project).

job_id

Optional. A string containing the job ID (e.g., "job-Gk2...") or a list returned by dx_extract. If provided, all_projects is ignored.

limit

Numeric. Number of recent jobs to show in the dashboard (default: 3).

Value

The state of the job as a string (if job_id provided) or a data frame of recent jobs (if job_id is NULL), invisibly.

Details

When called without a job_id, it displays a "htop"-style dashboard of the last several jobs.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# 1. View dashboard of recent jobs in current project
dx_status()

# 2. View dashboard for ONLY the current project
dx_status(all_projects = FALSE)

# 3. Check status of a specific job
dx_status(job_id = "job-Gk2PzX0Jj1X4Y5Z6")
} # }
